row.scheme: ;;; d-SetFontSize (define SetScoreSize::Size (d-ScoreProperties "query=fontsize")) (set! SetScoreSize::Size (d-GetUserInput "Overall Score Sizing" "Give font size to use" SetScoreSize::Size)) (if (boolean? SetScoreSize::Size) (set! SetScoreSize::Size (d-ScoreProperties "query=fontsize"))) (d-ScoreProperties (string-append "fontsize=" SetScoreSize::Size)) (d-SetSaved #f)
row._tooltip: Choose the font size of for the score, and hence how much space it takes up.
